Package com.paydiant.android.core.service

Contains the services to facilitate core facade services.

See: Description

    The Interface IApplicationInformationManagerService.
    IATMCashManagerService
    Interface defining ATM cash access services.

    The Interface ICustomerManagerService.
    IDeviceInfoManagerService
    This class defines the operations required to manage several device specific information, such as device attributes, device specific ids/tokens etc.
    IDeviceManagerService
    The interface which exposes all the device services to the SDK itself.
    IGiftAccountManagerService
    The Interface defining operations related to gift accounts.

    The Interface IImageDownloadManagerService.
    ILoyaltyManagerService
    This interface defines the services required for loyalty management.

Package com.paydiant.android.core.service Description

Contains the services to facilitate core facade services.

Warning: DO NOT reference the core.service package classes directly as these are missing the required business functionalities. Use core.facade or ui.service classes instead.
